channel.title: Help about dieing
channel.description: When Someone dies, I want them to drop 1k cash, even if they don't have it. What code would I use for that? Like Example dropItem(995, 1000); =Did not work= What code would i use?

item.title: Help about dieing
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“parkview, post:3, topic:222619”][quote author=primadude link=topic=292391.msg2354777#msg2354777 date=1217260304]
In your applydead Method, add this:

ItemHandler.addItem(995, absX, absY, 1000, KillerId, false);

[/quote]
Thank you for taking the time to respond to this simple question which helped me loads! :)[/quote]

No problem.

Read full topic
